JobFullDesc: The Facebook Product Security team is responsible for the code level security of Facebook. We do this by finding, fixing and preventing security flaws across our codebase. The Program Analysis team is responsible for the “detection” bucket of our work and does this by building systems and infrastructure that enable static code analysis. In particular, our team in MPK builds and maintains the Pyre type checker for Python and its security-focused static analysis components. These tools are tailored to detecting security issues and helping our security engineers scale. In this role, you will interact with all parts of the codebase and the company in the goal of eliminating entire categories of security flaws at their root and prevent them from happening ever again. As such, the manager of this team should have a strong software engineering background, and enjoy building systems like static analyzers and the corresponding infrastructure.
